opas.p: Added View manager to FinFamily. Views can be used to group persons for certain uses e.g. for making copies of a part of teh database only that part can be identified as being the persons in the view. Views are managed using the database tables views and viewunits.
Groups is another way of grouping persons. Every person can have only one group and can be a member of several views.
